snippet.title: SUPER LUIGI LAND WII - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Hey guys, it's finally time for SUPER LUIGI LAND WII! This game is a mod of New Super Mario Bros. Wii using assets from Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii. Mario has gone missing yet again, and it's up to Luigi and co. to save him once more! However, this time, they have Luigi's unique set of physics on their side!

Features
• Luigi!
• jump higher, fall slower, run faster, and slide farther than Mario does
• 20+ brand new diverse and adventurous levels
• 50+ tricky star coins to find and collect
• 3 new worlds with new maps
• new bonus game challenges
• new bosses
• various recolored objects and tiles
• ...and much more!

DOWNLOAD LINK
https://bit.ly/SuperLuigiLandWii

Join our Discord to discuss the game, report any bugs, etc.
https://discord.gg/h5bXEdn

Trailer Music:
Mangrove Cove | Donkey Kong Country Tropical Freeze

Project directed by Mullkaw
